nio/ModbusRTU.description: Communicate with a Modbus device over RTU Serial.

address.title: Starting Address
address.description: The starting address to read from or write to.

count.title: Number of coils/registers to read
count.description: The number of coils/discretes/registers to read.

port_config.title: Serial Port Setup
port_config.description: The modbus port to connect to (default 502). If left blank, the default pymodbus3 value will be used.

retry.title: Number of Retries before Error
retry.description: How many times to retry connection on failure.

value.title: Write Value(s)
value.description: The value to write to the specified address.

default.description: Drive reads and writes with input signals.
Notifies a signal for each frame read from Modbus.

address.title: Starting Address

enrich.title: Signal Enrichment
enrich.description: If true, the incoming signal will be attached to the output signal.

retry.title: Number of Retries before Error
retry.description: How many times to retry connection on failure.

value.title: Write Value(s)

default.description: Drive reads and writes with input signals.
